mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SMS.SMSDATA ( SEQNO, INDATE, INTIME, MEMBER, SENDID, SENDNAME, RPHONE1, RPHONE2, RPHONE3, RECVNAME, SPHONE1, SPHONE2, SPHONE3, MSG, RESULT, KIND, SYS_GBN, USERID ) VALUES ( SMS.SQ_SMSDATA.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS'), 0, #{sendid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rphone1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rphone2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rphone3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recvname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sphone1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sphone2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sphone3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '0', 'S', #{sysGbn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO SMS.SUREDATA ( SEQNO, INTIME, USERCODE, BIZTYPE, YELLOWID_KEY, REQNAME, REQPHONE, CALLNAME, CALLPHONE, MSG, REQTIME, RESULT, KIND, RESEND, TEMPLATECODE ) VALUES ( SMS.SQ_SUREDATA.NEXTVAL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{usercode}, #{biztype}, #{yellowidKey}, #{reqname}, #{reqphone}, #{callname}, #{callphone}, #{msg}, #{reqtime}, #{result}, #{kind}, #{resend}, #{templatecode} )
